text: læa hak cea (muhammad) chngn dangnan kha klaw khxng phwk khea k na chngn (thi wa) “meux rea klay pen phuyphng pi læw thæcring rea ca keid hım kranan hrux?” Chn hela nan khux br rda phu pdi seth sraththa tx phracea khxng phwk khea læa chn hela nan khux chaw nrk phwk khea ca xyu nı nan tlxd kal
